name: this is our home
description:
this is our home

Two siblings come home from a journey in the desert. A song on a record player brings feelings of home.

A kinda late entry to the Emma's Bitsy Birthday Bash 2. Definitely leaned more on the 'home' side of the theme rather than 'house,' but uhh,,,

The song referenced is The Halocline by Hippo Campus.

Made with Bitsy.
